replies.body: Hey guys, does anyone know when Knockout lee sin or Shockblade zed is going on sale? Pls reply
Ugh gotta wait 2 hours for Yorick :'(

Captain's Log
Stardate 20/10/15

The men are getting restless. 13 hours have passed since the turning of the day and Subterranean Nautilus is yet to go on sale. I fear for my life.
They go on sale from _** 18:00 AEDT**_ If you're in a non-daylight savings state this will be 17:00 ( 5:00 Pm )
